document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the adult nematode parasites of fishes in freshwater localities from Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the adult nematode parasites of fishes in freshwater localities from Mexico

heading.emphasis:
Procamallanus ( Spirocamallanus ) rebecae
(Andrade­Salas, Pineda­López & García­ Magaña, 1994 ) Moravec, Vivas­Rodríguez, Scholz, Vargas­Vázquez, Mendoza­

subSubSection.paragraph:
CAMPECHE : El Vapor:
Cichlasoma geddesi
,
Cichlasoma urophthalmus
,
Parachromis managuensis
,
Petenia splendida , Vieja synspila
(
142
),
Thorichthys helleri
(
4 , 142
); Santa Gertrudis:
C . urophthalmus
(
142
); Silvituc:

,

,
C. urophthalmus
,

P. splendida
(

( CNHE 2194 ). OAXACA : Puente Valle Nacional:

sp.(

).

(
86 , 104
); Mitza:

(

).

Note : This species was described as
Spirocamallanus rebecae
(
4 ,
27
, 148 ); however,
Spirocamallanus
is considered as a subgenus of
Procamallanus
(
101
). Specimens reported as
Spirocamallanus pereirai
( 40 , 113 , 120, 126 ) were re­identified as
Procamallanus ( Spirocamallanus ) rebecae
from Tabasco(
142
) and Veracruz (
149
). Record from Michoacán constitutes unpublished data, not collected during this survey.
